ThingDef.label: British No. 36M Mk I Mills Bomb Grenades
ThingDef.description: Old-school fragmentation grenades used during WW2. They can be thrown a short distance, where they'll explode, damaging anything and anyone nearby.

ThingDef.label: British No. 73 Anti-Tank Grenade
ThingDef.description: Heavy explosive grenades used during WW2. They can be thrown a short distance and are designed to damage or destroy armored targets.

ThingDef.label: British No. 74 Sticky Bomb Anti-Tank Grenades
ThingDef.description: Heavy explosive grenades used during WW2. They can be thrown a short distance and are designed to damage or destroy armored targets.
